page.title: 09A day at school
page.content: Lower Junior Class age 7-9 In the morning I come to school by bus.When I get into the cloakroom I take my coat off and hang my bag up. Then in class I put my lunch box on a cupboard.I get my tray out then go out to play in the playground. Our play ground has a place for football and net-ball.I play with my friends.Before assembly we have the register.Our teacher is Mrs.Price.But today Mr.Denton took the register.He is the head master.In assembly the whole school goes into a big room called the hall.Our class sits against the partition which divides our classroom and the hall.One of my friends got a ten length certificate for swimming in the school pool.Mr.Denton tells us a story then we sing a hymn.
